revised_title: Effects of Colchicum Autumnale on Gout and Circulation
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the effects of Colchicum Autumnale on gout and circulation. They found that the medicine can be received into the circulation without permanent harm and its beneficial effects on gout are produced through that medium. The author also observed the effects of a larger quantity of the medicine injected into a dog's circulation, which resulted in inflammation of the stomach and intestines, proving that the action of Colchicum Autumnale on the body is through the medium of the circulation.
